main event: On July 8, 1961, a bright luminous object hovered over Metuchen, New Jersey, for approximately five minutes before shooting straight up and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed through binoculars and appeared to be bright and golden in color., The observer reported the object made no sound., The sighting lasted about three minutes., This report was part of the Project Blue Book documentation., The investigator concluded it might have been a high flying jet reflecting sunlight.
witness description: An observer who observed the object through binoculars.
